languages.text: {n}Воздух вокруг Хейнрикса звенит от морозной стужи. Дознаватель сплевывает кровью и морщится — явно от боли от кровоподтека на скуле.{/n} "Ну что за прыткая падаль, а..."
{n}The air around Heinrix seems to crackle with cold. He is grimacing and spitting blood, clearly in pain from a bruise on his cheekbone.{/n} "Pretty quick for carrion..."
languages.original_text: {n}Воздух вокруг Хейнрикса звенит от морозной стужи. Дознаватель сплевывает кровью и морщится — явно от боли от кровоподтека на скуле.{/n} "Ну что за прыткая падаль, а..."

languages.text: {n}海因里希周身散发着阵阵冰冷的寒气。他一脸痛苦地吐着血沫，颧骨被打得青肿。{/n}“以一堆烂肉的标准来看，你的身手还不赖……”
languages.original_text: {n}The air around Heinrix seems to crackle with cold. He is grimacing and spitting blood, clearly in pain from a bruise on his cheekbone.{/n} "Pretty quick for carrion..."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希周身散发着阵阵冰冷的寒气。他一脸痛苦地吐着血沫，颧骨被打得青肿。{/n}“以一堆烂肉的标准来看，你的身手还不赖……”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}El aire parece crepitar de frío en torno a Heinrix. Hace una mueca de dolor y escupe sangre, acusando claramente el daño de su magullado pómulo.{/n} «Para ser carroña, es bastante rápido...».
languages.original_text: {n}The air around Heinrix seems to crackle with cold. He is grimacing and spitting blood, clearly in pain from a bruise on his cheekbone.{/n} "Pretty quick for carrion..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El aire parece crepitar de frío en torno a Heinrix. Hace una mueca de dolor y escupe sangre, acusando claramente el daño de su magullado pómulo.{/n} «Para ser carroña, es bastante rápido...».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Autour d'Heinrix, l'air semble crépiter d'un froid mordant. Il crache du sang en grimaçant. Il ne fait aucun doute que la blessure qui orne sa pommette est particulièrement douloureuse.{/n} « Plutôt rapide pour une vulgaire charogne... »
languages.original_text: {n}The air around Heinrix seems to crackle with cold. He is grimacing and spitting blood, clearly in pain from a bruise on his cheekbone.{/n} "Pretty quick for carrion..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Autour d'Heinrix, l'air semble crépiter d'un froid mordant. Il crache du sang en grimaçant. Il ne fait aucun doute que la blessure qui orne sa pommette est particulièrement douloureuse.{/n} « Plutôt rapide pour une vulgaire charogne... »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die Luft um Heinrix scheint vor Kälte zu knistern. Er verzieht das Gesicht und spuckt Blut, da er offensichtlich von einem Bluterguss an seinem Wangenknochen geplagt wird.{/n} "Ziemlich schnell für eine Missgeburt ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The air around Heinrix seems to crackle with cold. He is grimacing and spitting blood, clearly in pain from a bruise on his cheekbone.{/n} "Pretty quick for carrion..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Luft um Heinrix scheint vor Kälte zu knistern. Er verzieht das Gesicht und spuckt Blut, da er offensichtlich von einem Bluterguss an seinem Wangenknochen geplagt wird.{/n} "Ziemlich schnell für eine Missgeburt ..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの周囲の空気は冷たく、ひび割れるようだった。彼は顔を歪め、血を流していた。その原因が頬骨のアザにあることは明らかだった。{/n}「腐ったヤツにしては素早い…」
languages.original_text: {n}The air around Heinrix seems to crackle with cold. He is grimacing and spitting blood, clearly in pain from a bruise on his cheekbone.{/n} "Pretty quick for carrion..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの周囲の空気は冷たく、ひび割れるようだった。彼は顔を歪め、血を流していた。その原因が頬骨のアザにあることは明らかだった。{/n}「腐ったヤツにしては素早い…」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in etrafını saran hava, soğukla birlikte çatırdıyor gibi duruyor. Yüzünü buruşturarak kan tükürüyor, elmacık kemiğindeki morartıdan dolayı acı içinde olduğu çok açık.{/n} "Bir leşçil için çok hızlı oldu..."
languages.original_text: {n}The air around Heinrix seems to crackle with cold. He is grimacing and spitting blood, clearly in pain from a bruise on his cheekbone.{/n} "Pretty quick for carrion..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix'in etrafını saran hava, soğukla birlikte çatırdıyor gibi duruyor. Yüzünü buruşturarak kan tükürüyor, elmacık kemiğindeki morarmadan dolayı acı içinde olduğu çok açık.{/n} "Bir leşçil için çok hızlı oldu..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
